project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A portal that provides a personalized onboarding experience, self-service knowledge base, and adoption metrics for customers of the main SaaS product.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to securely log in using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can log in with their existing credentials
Seamless transition from main SaaS product to COSP

feature_breakdown.description: Display a personalized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Customers see a relevant onboarding checklist based on their subscription level
Checklist items can be marked as completed

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can search and view all relevant product documentation
Search results are accurate and up-to-date

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count).
acceptance_criteria: Customers can view relevant adoption metrics in a clear and intuitive dashboard

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily contact their CSM with pre-populated information
Ticket or email is correctly routed to the right CSM

system_components: Logging and Monitoring (Elasticsearch, Kibana, Prometheus, Grafana)
technical_architecture.data_flow: User requests -> API Gateway -> Microservices -> Database/Message Queue -> Responses
security_considerations: Use TLS 1.2+ for all network communications
Regularly audit and update security policies and practices
Implement logging and monitoring for security events

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the minimum viable product with core functionality.
deliverables: Integrated with existing systems (SSO, CRM, Knowledge Base)

implementation_phases.description: Implement the adoption metrics dashboard feature.

risk_analysis.description: Delays in third-party API integration (CRM, Knowledge Base, Zendesk)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with third-party vendors early, establish clear communication and SLAs, have a contingency plan for manual workarounds

risk_analysis.description: Underestimation of development effort for complex features (Onboarding Checklists, Adoption Metrics Dashboard)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Conduct thorough technical analysis, involve experienced engineers, build in buffer time, and implement agile practices for continuous re-evaluation

risk_analysis.description: Insufficient budget to implement all planned features
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Prioritize features based on business value, explore cost-saving measures, and secure additional funding if necessary

success_metrics.measurement_method: Monthly analysis of customer retention data
Tracking the time from onboarding to first feature adoption

success_metrics.target_value: 25% reduction in time spent on manual onboarding tasks
success_metrics.measurement_method: Time tracking and analysis of CSM activities

success_metrics.target_value: 40% of support questions resolved via the portal
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitoring the ratio of portal-resolved vs. ticket-based support requests
